title: Is This a Real Video of an Arrow That Always Points to the Right?
subtitle: No computer-aided manipulation was used to create this video of an arrow that always points right, even when you spin it 180 degrees.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: An optical illusion allows a 3D arrow to appear as if it is always pointing in the same direction (with its mirror reflection showing the opposite direction), even when it is rotated 180 degrees.
